description:
r/Choosingbeggars In today's episode, a business owner gets on Facebook to whine about his employees expecting a paycheck for their hard work. Can you believe how selfish those employees are? What kind of terrible person expects money for work?! The business owner wishes he could find some employees who would just work for free, forever. Wouldn't that be nice? If you like this video, subscribe to my channel for more daily Reddit videos!

Watch on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=B_xUGe2U72w
